scripts.ci:release:dev: pnpm release-it --ci --git.requireBranch='dev' --preRelease=beta --git.commitMessage='chore: release v${version}' --no-github.release --github.preRelease=true && echo "Building development release"
scripts.ci:release:staging: pnpm release-it --ci --git.requireBranch='staging' --preRelease=rc --git.commitMessage='chore: release v${version}' --no-github.release --github.preRelease=true && echo "Building staging release"
scripts.ci:release:production: pnpm release-it --ci --git.requireBranch='main' --git.commitMessage='chore: release v${version}' --no-github.release && echo "Building production release"

github.releaseNotes:
gh release view v${version} --repo ${github.repository} --json body --jq .body || echo '## What''s Changed
'$(git log v${latestVersion}..HEAD --pretty=format:'* %s by @%an in https://github.com/${github.repository}/pull/%H
' | grep -v 'Merge pull request' | sort -u)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/${github.repository}/compare/v${latestVersion}...v${version}
